newsitem.title: USA: System Software May contracts total $25 mln.
newsitem.headline: System Software May contracts total $25 mln.

text.p: System Software Associates Inc said Monday it was awarded about $25 million in software contracts in the month of May.
The contracts represent the largest for any first month of a quarter in the history of the company, it said.
The total value of the May contracts will not be entirely bookable in the third quarter," said Joe Skadra, System Software chief financial officer, in a statement.
"In addition, although these results are encouraging, they may not be indicative of the results of the third quarter overall," he added.
Shares of System Software were trading up 2/16 to 8-15/16.
